item.description: I will be joining Bosch's Junior Managers Program in Fall 2020. I will be joining the R&D team, with a particular focus on Robotics and Automated Driving. I recently completed Master Thesis at ABB's Corporate Research Center in Switzerland. The title of my thesis was "Data-Driven adaptive MPC using reinforcement learning". Previously, I completed an internship at Volkswagen AG in Germany. Where I was part of the automated driving functions team, where deep learning techniques are exploited for autonomous driving.
